summary: Droppable Eggs that will spawn followers, horses, dogs, swords, just ask for it and ill do my best
descriptionHtml:
[Size=4][B][Color=Brown]Original I Designed this mod to allow you to have any follower you wanted but as i progressed on creating it i found out you could have a entire army of followers at your side. which hence cause the name change to Egg Armies of Skyrim. Cause that is exactly what it does, helps you make a army. For the past days I have been working on a egg that actually gives you a Army. I promise once i work out my problem with the egg I'm working on. I will expand on it, so i need to know if this would be a ok mod or not and remember the dwemer are master of everything who says they haven't been able to imbued, objects with souls and living materials.[/Color][/B][/size]

[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/a2vw7mlt5mwobav/Eggs%20Of%20Skyrim%20Banner.jpg?dl=1&token_hash=AAHTUXGL2m8rI0bH-i2QEb7T_oA898RsLb2gaTngtEa-nA[/img]
[Size=4]Welcome I hope you enjoy this mod, I am wondering if anyone would use a egg that spawns a Army of 20 men.

[Color=aqua]I would like to say thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5680235]skymarin[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3307004]Sdesser[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2619101]FrostTheArgonian[/url], [Url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2641844]axelstoner[/Url], [Url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1926808]T3alrose[/Url], [Url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3589504] Inflim[/Url], and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2157040/?]innova889[/url] that have given me ideas for the eggs[/Color][/Size]

[b][u]Basically what i am aiming to do, making eggs that once you drop it from your inventory something spawns[/u][/b]

If you got any ideas for example like some more creatures either comment, or click the link right here [url=http://eggsofskyrim.freeforums.org/eggs-of-skyrim-got-any-idea-s-t13.html][b]IDEAS[/b][/url]

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=215115405]Eggs Of Skyrim Steam Copy[/url]

[b]---Requires No DLC[/b]
[b]sneak and click to pick them back up[/b]


Latest Version
[List]1.G

[*][s]Imperial Army of 20 followers[/s] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/4m5t1b069j4giel/.jpg?dl=1&token_hash=AAFwJZCiK05lNF6leJ23cmgotIz10abCQUxONYjr5OTDEw[/img]

and more dragon types
[/list]


[url=http://eggsofskyrim.freeforums.org/current-egg-list-reciepes-t11.html]List of the Current eggs and they are craftable through the Egg Of Creation, also the reciepes[/Url]


[b]Egg Of Creation[/b]
[img]http://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/687097840281894026/4E6646DA1060FA41888F90E044629E0161E1E2F5/1024x768.resizedimage[/img]

[B]My Own Personal Army[/B]
[Img]http://cloud-4.steampowered.com/ugc/687097840281716670/EC65F0B6F66F67578508E47DE29988B57BF705EB/1024x768.resizedimage[/Img]


Old Versions[list]
[*]V1.F- I have made a merchant outside [spoiler]kynesgrove.[/Spoiler] enjoy [b]â˜º[/b]
[*]V1.E- I have now added Six more eggs, for a mudcrab, Horker, Wolf, Dog, Giant, and mammoth enjoy they craftable from the Egg Of Creation.
[*]V1.D- I have made a person crafter for the eggs, can be crafted from the forge but be carefully where you drop it, cant pick it up again. I have also added 3 more eggs, they are Atronaches, feel free to drop as many as u want.
[*]V1.C- the dragons will now fight for you added in a baby world eater so far you got to use the console to get it, sorry guys. its late and been working on baby dragon all day, its was annoying me all day.
[*]V1.b- I have added in 2 more eggs that are craftable at the forge im sorry took me all day to do it working out the small bugs in the miniture anicent dragon, so as soon as you drop these eggs the npc's will follow you without dismissing any current followers. enjoy im already in love with the mini dragon.
[*]V1- The 2 eggs that have been made so far can be crafted from the forge, all you need to craft the Icy Egg is to have the Frostbite spell, black soul gem (filled) and a Pine Thrush Egg. To Craft the horse egg, u need a common soul gem (filled) a horse hide and Chickens Egg.
[/list]





Please comment, download so i know if i should continue on this idea [/Size]
author: Duck
